resources.string: Do you want to close the application?
This is a social app where you can donate resources to someone that really need it.
Become a donor and you will have the opportunity to see profiles of people in need and help them.
Be a volunteer and help to register and manage the profiles of people that need help.
If you have a Liquid Galaxy System installed you can view all this info into a spectacular panoramic screens.
Here you can access the Liquid Galaxy System:
Introduce a valid password.Password must have at least 6 characters
Please, verify your email address to login!
To reset your password, enter the email address you use to login to HAPIS.
The email field is not valid or is empty
An email has been sent to the supplied email address.\nFollow the instructions in the email to reset your password.
Fail to send reset password email!\Check that the email is correct
What can you do if you register as volunteer?

1. You can connect with people without resources who need our help 

 2. You can create and manage profiles for them, since they do not always have a mobile phone connected to the Internet 

 3. You can help to make the donation delivery in case the donors do not have the possibility to do it personally
What can you do if you register as donor?

1. You can help people without basic resources such as food, accommodation or clothing 

 2. You can choose the profile of the person who most attracts your attention and help them 

 3. You can donate food, clothing, accommodation, work or personal hygiene products 

 4. You can deliver the aid personally or with the help of a volunteer
Thank you. Please check your email to activate your account.
I agree the Terms and Conditions and the Privacy Policy
You have to agree the Terms and conditions first!
You\'re almost there!\n We sent you an email, just click on the link you received to complete your register.\n THANK YOU!
There already exists an account with this email address!
Enter a valid username. Username must have at least 4 characters
You have to fill this field
This button will let the volunteer edit the shown fields of the homeless
With this button the homeless profile will be deleted

Go on the floating menu and select
 New homeless profile
 to create your first homeless profile.


 THANK YOU for your collaboration!
Next, search and select the location where the donors can find the homeless person
You have selected the next location:
You have to select a location
Write something about you and your life experiences
Life History must be between 20 and 400 characters large.
Write when the homeless could be found on the previous selected location:
Next, select the most important need of the homeless person in this moment:
The most important need selected is:
You have to complete the schedule
Schedule must be between 5 and 40 characters large.
You have to chose your most important need
SMS is required on this number
Before you start creating the profile, read the following terms and privacy policy to the homeless persona and make sure that he/she understand it and gives his/her consent with the signature.

1. Next, the volunteer will ask you for some personal information in order to create your profile, so that people will better understand your situation and be able to help you 

2. You will not be asked for your real name, but a username that will be visible to donors 

3. You can add a photo of yourself to the profile, but it is not required. 

4. You will be asked for your birth date,your phone number, a short story from your life and what you need most right now. 

5. You will have to specify the location and a time in which you can be found in said location. This information is used by people who want to donate something to hand things over to you.

6. All the data provided will be used only so that people know you better in order to help you and at no time will it be transferred to third parties.
Sign has been successfully saved!You can continue with the register
Information successfully saved!You can continue with register
Cannot write images to external storage
I agree the terms and conditions
You have to sign in order to continue!
To confirm enter the first and last name of the person who signed.
THE ACCOUNT HAS BEEN SUCCESSFULLY CREATED!
Change your existing phone number or add a new one
You changed your phone number successfully. Next time you login you can see your new phone number on your profile info.
Change your password.You only have to enter the new password.
By this you delete your account for ever.Are you sure?
Something went wrong. Please try again later
Authentication Failed!Prove to exit application an get back in with the new password.
You can see deliveries for all homeless or only for homeless profiles created by you
You have successfully sent your message.\n We\'ll revert back to you as soon as possible.
You have successfully sent your message.\n We\'ll revert back to you as soon as possible to the registered email address.
This field can not be empty!
Your generous support helps us to continue with this application.
Watch a 30 seconds video to donate €0.40.
Choose the manner you want to make your donation
will be added to our statistics
You have to select a type of help first.
Are you sure you want to delete this profile? \nAll info will be lost!
You have to edit at least one field to edit!
The donot still wants to be contacted again by another volunteer to establish a meeting point, or is cancelled all the delivery?
You can find the homeless person in the next location in order tu give your donation
It will be here in the next schedule
Establish a close meeting point, the day and time to meet the volunteer and he will contact you.
Thank you for your help! The volunteer will receive this data and will contact you
You have to select a date!
You have to select an hour!
You have to select the location!
Did you delivered this donation to homeless?
Dis you contact and establish the meeting poiont with this user?
was delivered.\Thank you for your help!
You chose the map to be visible only with Wifi.
You are about to enter into the Liquid Galaxy part
All the functionalities in this part will work only is you have a functional Liquid Galaxy installed!
Error connecting with Liquid Galaxy system. Try changing username, password, port or the host ip
Choose the slave where you want to see the logos.
Choose the slave where you want to see the homeless balloon.
Choose the slave where you want to see the local statistics balloon.
Choose the slave where you want to see the global statistics balloon.
Error connecting with Liquid Galaxy. Please, try changing settings.
Removed all HAPIS info from Liquid Galaxy
This is necessary when you first use the application with the Liquid Galaxy.\n This allows you to see all the information on the screens.
By this you delete all information and requirements of HAPIS into the Liquid Galaxy.
You can find the complete guide of HAPIS in HAPIS Wiki
Connect to the Liquid Galaxy for the first time

To connect with the Liquid Galaxy for the first time follow the next steps:
 1.In the menu select Setting. Here, complete the LG user, password, IP and port. The port normally is 22.
 2. In Advanced Setting you can find 5 options.Here, you can select which is the slave screen where you want to see that info.
 3. Go back to main dashboard and select Tools on the menu.
 4. In Tools select the menu option Install and press OK button. This way you install all the requirements into the Liquid Galaxy master.
 5. If you want to delete all the Hapis related info from the LG master, you just have to select the Uninstall button.

In the main dashboard you have 3 buttons:
 1. Cities: By pressing this button you go to another page where you can see all the cities where we have homeless registerd.
 2. City Statistics: This button flies to each city and shows you the local statistics on Liquid Galaxy.
 3. Global Statistics: This button shows you the statistics for all cities into a single bubble on Liquid Galaxy.

If you select Tools on the menu, you can see 4 buttons:
 1. Clean KML: By pressing this button, you delete all the kmls shown on the Liquid Galaxy. It also cleans the slaves.
 2. Relaunch LG: By pressing this button you make a relaunch of he Liquid Galaxy.
 3. Reboot LG: Makes a reboot of the Liquid Galaxy.
 4. Shutdown LG: This buttons shuts down the Liquid Galaxy.

When you select a city, in the Liquid Galaxy you can see how it flies to the city and on the device you can see four buttons on the dashboard. Next, you can what is doing each of them:
 1. Homeless: Shows you a list of all homeless in the selected city and all the placemarks into the Liquid Galaxy.
 2. Volunteers:Shows you a list of all volunteers in the selected city and all the placemarks into the Liquid Galaxy.
 3.Donors: Shows you a list of all donors in the selected city and all the placemarks into the Liquid Galaxy.
 4.Live Overview: Into the Liquid Galaxy,flies to each city, shows the local statistics on a screen and passes for all homeless, showing the information bubble into another screen.

When you select Homeless on a city, you can see a list of all homeless persons in that city.When you select a homeless username, in the Liquid Galaxy flies to his position and shows the basic information.
 Each username has 3 buttons:
 1. Life History: Shows the life history too, on the Liquid Galaxy.
 2. Transactions: Shows the donations that the homeless received.
 3. Orbit: Realize an orbit around that homeless.

When you select Volunteers on a city, you can see a list of all volunteers in that city.When you select a volunteer username, in the Liquid Galaxy flies to his position and shows the basic information.
 Each username has 3 buttons:
 1. Extra: Shows the first name, last name and phone too, on the Liquid Galaxy.
 2. Transactions: Shows how many homeless profiles he created.
 3. Orbit: Realize an orbit around that volunteer.

When you select Donors on a city, you can see a list of all donors in that city.When you select a donor username, in the Liquid Galaxy flies to his position and shows the basic information.
 Each username has 3 buttons:
 1. Extra: Shows the first name, last name and phone too, on the Liquid Galaxy.
 2. Transactions: Shows how many donations he realized.
 3. Orbit: Realize an orbit around that donor.
This app has been developed thanks to Intership students as a new application from GSoC 2020 Project
Developed thanks to TIC Laboratories of the Scientific Park of Lleida and Liquid Galaxy LAB
The next persons helped to realize this project, so THANK YOU ALL.

All the photos in this application are from the Unsplash page.\n

Next you can find the author and link to the photos I use:

 Login photo
 Register page
 The icons are all from the icons8.com page
 And, the .png images are from the cleanpng.com page.
 All the homeless people photos are obtained using the next Databases

1. To help a person, you can choose between 5 types of donations: Food, Clothing, Work, Accommodation or Personal hygiene products.\n2. To choose the type of aid, select the profile in which you are interested and in the \"Select your donation\" part you can choose an item.\n3. If your donation is not on the list, nothing happens, choose an existing option and make the donation you consider anyway.
As you can see, a donation can be made personally or through a volunteer.

1. To make a donation personally, after having chosen the type of donation, in the section 
"Select how you want to make your donation
" select the "Personally" button.
2. A new page will open with information about a meeting point and time previously established so that you can go and personally give your donation to the person you have chosen.
3. If you want and the person in need agrees, you can share photos to our social networks showing donations.

1. To make a donation through a volunteer, after having chosen the type of donation, in the section "Select how you want to make your donation" select the button "Through a volunteer".
2. A new page will open allowing you to set up a meeting point with a volunteer to deliver the donation.
3. After filling in the form with the location, date and time that suit you, the volunteer will receive this information, as well as your email and phone number (if you have it in your profile).
4. A volunteer will contact you as soon as possible.

1. On the map you will see the markers of all the people who need help.\n2. If you select a marker, you can see the username and the time you can find the person in need in that location.\n3. If you press the information window, you will be redirected to that person\'s help page so you can make your donation.

1. In the map list you can see maps for each person in need.\n2. If you select the first button on the map, the Google Maps application will open, showing the route from your location to the location of the person in need.\n3. If you select the second button on the map, it will only open the Google Maps application and show the location of the person in need.

1. As you can see in the side menu, there is a Donate button.\n2. Here you can donate money to support the team that is responsible for maintaining the application, taking into account that it is a social project.\n3. Money can be donated through a secure payment system, using the credit / debit card or you can contribute with a donation made by third parties, watching a video of no more than 30 seconds.

1. In settings you can modify information related to your profile, such as phone number or password.\n2. The account can also be permanently deleted. \ N3. In Map you can choose the option to load the map only when you have a Wi-Fi connection and in this way save mobile data if you prefer.
1. On this page you will find a contact form to send us a message.\n2. Once the message has been sent, we will contact you through the email with which you created the account.

1. The first time you enter the application you will not see any profiles, since only the profiles created by you appear.
2. To create a profile, in the floating button select \ "New profile person in need ".
3. Before starting with the profile, you will see a page with terms and conditions that will have to be read and understood by the person in need and then they will have to sign and confirm with their name and surname.
4. Next, you have to fill in the profile information. The phone and the date of birth are not mandatory and will only be used if the person in need agrees. The photo can be uploaded from the Gallery or using the device's Camera.
5. On the next screen, provide a location where donors can find the person in need to make personal deliveries.
6. Finally, complete a schedule in which the person in need can be found in the location established above and the most important need they have at this time.

1. To edit a profile, select an item from the main screen. You will be able to edit the profile photo, phone, life experience, location, time and the most important need.\n2. You can also delete a profile completely, if the person in need wishes.

1. Donations can be delivered personally or through a volunteer.
2. If a donor chooses to donate through a volunteer, this information will be displayed on the \ "Deliver donations " page located on the floating button.
3. If you wish, you can contact the donors via email or telephone (if they have provided it). If a donation card appears with the text "Donor Contacted" means that another volunteer has already contacted him and established a meeing point, so don't contact it again.
4. If you have contacted a donor and have established a meeting point, select the \ "Contacted Donor " button so that other volunteers will not also contact him.
5. Once you have made a donation, select the button \ "Delivered Donation " and confirm it. In this way the donor will receive a notification that their donation has been delivered.
6. If the delivery cannot be made for various reasons, select the button \ "Cancel Delivery ".
7. If the donor still wants to be contacted by other volunteers to establish a new meeting point, select the button \ "Contact again ".
8. If the donor no longer wants to make this delivery, select the button \ "Cancel All Delivery. " This will delete all information related to this delivery.
9. If you wish and the person in need agrees, you can share photos to our social networks showing the delivery of donations.

1. As you can see in the side menu, there is a Donate button.\n2. Here you can donate money to support the team that is responsible for maintaining the application, taking into account that it is a social project.\n3. Money can be donated through a secure payment system, using the credit / debit card or you can contribute with a donation made by third parties, watching a video of no more than 30 seconds.

1. In settings you can modify information related to your profile, such as phone number or password.\n2. You can also choose whether you want to see all donation deliveries or just donations from people in need whose profile you have created.\n3. If you want to permanently delete your account, you will have to contact us to assign the profiles you have created to other volunteers before deleting the account.
1. On this page you will find a contact form to send us a message.\n2. Once the message has been sent, we will contact you through the email with which you created the account.
This application has been developed as part of the Final Degree Project.
Carried out by Mihaela Claudia Diosan, Computer Engineering student at the University of Lleida.
Thanks for helping and guiding me throughout the process to my director of the Final Degree Project, Montserrat Sendín Veloso.
